Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
changes to breadwallet core:
1. support for sapling tx signing
2. support for komodo ecosystem coins (i already did this to old breadwallet but without sapling signing)
3. support for nSPV

I estimate one to two months (at most) for the above, and that should be enough to get it so it can be part of the official breadwallet

Author: Fab√ò#8941
Content: ok perfect

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then, the breadwallet GUI would just work automatically with nSPV

Content: Token support -tokensupport@breadapp.com

Author: Fab√ò#8941
Content: thanks

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: 1. is about implementing https://github.com/zcash/zips/blob/master/zip-0243.rst

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: 2. is a matter of coin parameters

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: 3. is making a few calls per utxo to verify them, but also would require changing the internal control flow as it must be based on syncing all the headers

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: @jl777c I guess the first task must be the support to add zcash/komodo transparent SPV, like porting your changes from breadwallet iOS repo to breadwallet-core, and then add nSPV, and then add Sapling signing support. making the sapling signing task first they may probably feel it's too difficult.... or may be not, but just thinking....
